Curious about what a deposit guarantee scheme is? Read our Explainer to find out https://t.co/N9XAU9Ii48

There is no risk of cross-subsidisation within the European deposit insurance scheme as banking systems would not contribute less to the scheme than they would benefit from it. Read more about the results of the analysis in the latest occasional paper

A fully-funded European deposit insurance scheme would sufficiently cover payouts even in the event of a severe banking crisis. Find out more about the impact of this kind of scheme in the latest occasional paper https://t.co/dLxp7UGFvt https://t.co/joVw6duCp7

In 2017 unemployment fell to its lowest level since 2009. Overall, 7.5 million jobs have been created since mid-2013, offsetting the total number of jobs lost during the crisis. Read our Annual Report https://t.co/7neEWFicoe https://t.co/X09WxQu33B

Low inflation rates are a concern for us but in 2017 inflation drew nearer to our objective of below, but close to, 2% over the medium term. Check out our Annual Report to find more https://t.co/8epwOCDBEJ https://t.co/wUMyjQrOys
